definition: Borneo island (of Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei)

sentences.english: The Mulu Caves in Borneo are some of the most expansive on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 婆羅洲的姆魯巖洞是一些地球上最廣闊的洞穴。

sentences.english: porcupine of Borneo and Sumatra having short spines and a long tail.
sentences.chinese: 產於婆羅洲和蘇門答臘島的短刺長尾豪豬。

sentences.english: Many of the world’s remaining wild orangutans live in the rainforests of Borneo.
sentences.chinese: 世界上現存的一些野生猩猩都生活在婆羅洲。

sentences.english: Another hung on in Borneo, becoming the Sunda clouded leopard.
sentences.chinese: 其餘的只留在婆羅洲，成爲巽他雲豹。

sentences.english: One of the world's tiniest frogs has been discovered in Borneo.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最小的一種青蛙之一在婆羅洲被發現。

definition: Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable
honor guard/guard of honor/the banner bearing contingent leading a military procession
